attributes.action: Start petitions to stop building Churches, Mosques and other areas of worship, or even converting or starting worship areas inside existing buildings.
attributes.additional_details:
To Petition any area of the country to not build, not allow change of use of existing buildings for religious use, to stop the sale of buildings form one religious group to another.
Or make it law that every item to do with a place of worship, is advertised and send details to all households, to have a vote if it is to be allowed.
